history.content:
Hi everyone! I am making this post to share a CS TA opportunity for undergrads this summer! 
Redefine is a completely virtual and free computer science summer program for high schoolers run by computer science college students and recent graduates. I’m writing to see if any students would be interested in a teaching assistant position for our summer program!
 
The program will run until August 14th, 2021. The TA responsibilities include homework grading and content creation. More details about our TA responsibilities can be found here. If anyone is interested, please ask them to fill out the following form: http://bit.ly/redefine-s21-ta-form. 
 
If students are not interested in the TA role, but are interested in participating in another way (giving an interdisciplinary guest talk, student outreach, etc.) please let us know!
 
Thanks so much and please feel free to reach out with any questions!
history.subject: College Mentorship Opportunity — Redefine: CS Summer Program for High Schoolers
